tool_description: Creates and manages Kubernetes ConfigMaps for application configuration data.

configmap_name.description: Name of the ConfigMap to create

namespace.description: Namespace where ConfigMap will be created

kubeconfig.description: Base64 encoded kubeconfig for cluster access

error_messages: Invalid ConfigMap name: Must follow Kubernetes naming conventions.
Namespace not found: Specified namespace does not exist.
Kubeconfig authentication failed: Verify kubeconfig credentials.
Invalid config data format: Data must be in KEY=VALUE format.
ConfigMap already exists: Choose a different name or delete existing ConfigMap.
usage: Provide configmap_name, namespace, kubeconfig, and config_data. Creates the ConfigMap and returns creation status.
